message: Take it or leave it, Bob!
You're being generous, but I'm not settling for that little!
You're getting desperate, Alice. Don't think you can lowball me!
Last chance, Bob. Don't make me regret this!
You're really lowballing me now, Alice. I'm not going to let you get away with it!
This is my last offer, Bob. Take it or we'll be stuck in this loop forever!
You're not even trying to be subtle about it, Alice. This is ridiculous!
